Package com.twitter.common.application

Interface Summary
ActionRegistry Tracks actions to be run at a specific stage in an application lifecycle.
Application An application that supports a limited lifecycle and optional binding of guice modules.
 

Class Summary
AbstractApplication A base application class that provides empty implementations of all but the Runnable.run() method.
ActionController A ActionRegistry that provides a ActionController.execute() method that will ensure all registered actions are executed in the reverse order they were registered.
AppLauncher An application launcher that sets up a framework for pluggable binding modules.
AppLauncher.StageParser  
Lifecycle Application lifecycle manager, which coordinates orderly shutdown of an application.
 

Annotation Types Summary
ShutdownStage Binding annotation used for the shutdown controller/registry.
StartupStage Binding annotation used for the startup controller/registry.
